Reference

All functions

IDC_summary_scEpigenomics

A data.frame containing the summary of differential markers for scEpigenomics dataset (Paired-Tag - H3K27ac)

IDC_summary_scRNA

A data.frame containing the summary of differential markers for scRNA dataset (Paired-Tag - scRNA)

Seu

A Seurat object containing the scRNA part of Paired-Tag dataset. (Paired-Tag - scRNA)

calculate_FDR_scEpigenomics()

Calculate FDR for SingleCellExperiment object

create_pseudobulk_mat_Seu()

Create Pseudo-Bulk Matrice from scRNA clusters & replicates

differential_ChromSCape()

Differential analysis with ChromSCape (differential activation)

differential_Seurat()

Differential function Seurat (wilcoxon)

differential_edgeR_pseudobulk_LRT()

Pseudo-bulk differential analysis with edgeR (LRT)

find_differentiated_clusters()

Find Differentiated Clusters

iterative_differential_clustering()

iterative_differential_clustering

plot_cluster_network()

Plot Iterative Differential Clustering network

processing_ChromSCape()

Normalize and run PCA with ChromSCape (LSI)

processing_Seurat()

Normalize and run PCA with Seurat

scExp

A SingleCellExperiment object containing the scH3K27ac part of Paired-Tag dataset. (Paired-Tag - H3K27ac)

top_differential_markers.SingleCellExperiment()

Retrieve Top differential markers
